SummaryEnglish: There are other worlds out there. Digital, Organic, worlds where our dreams come true... Digimon Tamers takes place on an Earth where Digimon is a media icon. Card games and TV shows ARE Digimon. At least, that's what people think. A secret government organization has found another world, and its digital inhabitants are crossing over. Digimon run amok throughout Japan and three children with Digimon partners are out to stop them, learning important lessons along the way.
SummaryJapanese: どこにでもいるごく普通のデジモン大好き少年だったタカト。そんなタカトが見つけた青いカードは、カードリーダーを本物のデジヴァイスに変える不思議な力を秘めていた。画面に映るデジモンのタマゴ・デジタマをドキドキしながら見守るタカト。しかし次の日の朝、タカトが見たものはすでに割れてしまった空っぽのデジタマだった。それでもデジモンの誕生を信じ、生まれたはずのデジモンを自分から探しに行くタカト。そしてタカトは、空から降りてきた光の下で夢見ていた本物のデジモンに出会う！タカトの想像したとおりの姿で生まれてきたタカトだけのデジモン『ギルモン』に。「僕が、僕が考えたんだよ、君は......」ギルモンと出会えたことに素直な喜びを感じ、失敗したり落ち込んだりしながらも一生懸命ギルモンの世話を続けるタカト。はたしてこれから２人をどんな事件が待ちうけているのだろうか......！？

1.SummaryEnglish: Takato and Guilmon go on vacation to Okinawa and meet a fellow tamer, Minami. Back in Japan, a popular computer pet suddenly becomes a virus, infecting all of the computers who have it. As the virus spreads, Takato tries to figure out why digimon are all attacking his new friend, and what her connection is to the virus.
1.TitleJapanese: デジモンテイマーズ 冒険者たちの戦い

2.SummaryEnglish: Locomon, a train digimon, has suddenly appeared in the real world. All the tamers scramble to stop the train before it reaches its final destination: the portal into the Digital world.
2.TitleJapanese: デジモンテイマーズ 暴走デジモン特急

1.SummaryEnglish: Takato is a boy that loves Digimon, but can he handle becoming a digimon tamer when a mysterious digimon appears?
1.TitleJapanese: ギルモン誕生！僕の考えたデジモン

2.SummaryEnglish: Takato finds out he isn't the only digimon tamer, but when Renamon attacks Guilmon trouble begins. Can Takato learn what it truly means to be a tamer?
2.TitleJapanese: 君はぼくのともだち テリアモン登場！

3.TitleEnglish: To Fight or Not to Fight
3.SummaryEnglish: Henry decides to try and get the trainers to realize their is more to their digimon than just fighting, but what will he do when Terriermon digivolves?
3.TitleJapanese: レナモン対ギルモン！戦いこそがデジモンの命

4.TitleEnglish: It Came From the Other Side
4.SummaryEnglish: Can Henry overcome his fear of fighting in time to defeat Gorillamon, or is the real world in trouble?
4.TitleJapanese: テイマーの試練！ゴリモンを倒せ！

5.SummaryEnglish: The mysterious digimon Calumon is finally found by the tamers, but can they keep Calumon out of mischief long enough to find her a tamer?
5.TitleJapanese: くるっくるーん！クルモンと遊ぼ！

6.SummaryEnglish: Rika and Renamon get into a fight because Renamon won't digivolve causing them to seperate, but what will happen when Rika gets attacked by a new Digimon?
6.TitleJapanese: パートナーの意味 レナモン進化！

7.TitleEnglish: Now You See It, Now You Don't
7.SummaryEnglish: A mysterious fog abducts Guilmon and will delete him if the Tamers don't save him in time.
7.TitleJapanese: ギルモンが危ない！ ぼくの町の冒険

8.SummaryEnglish: Impmon appears and tricks Guilmon into doing pranks to people at night, Takato upon hearing this looses his trust for his partner. Meanwhile a DeviDramon Bio-Emerges in the city.
8.TitleJapanese: ギルモン進化！西新宿大決戦

9.SummaryEnglish: Growlmon just defeated Devidramon, but he cannot return to being Guilmon. Takato, Henry and Terriermon try everything to get him to De-Digivolve.
9.TitleJapanese: ギルモンに戻って！グラウモン騒動

10.SummaryEnglish: Renamon and Rika get into an argument because Renamon still can't Digivovle. IceDevimon captures Rika in hopes of making her be his partner.
10.TitleJapanese: レナモンは友達！留姫の迷い

11.SummaryEnglish: Henry struggles with Terriermon's desire to fight, as he doesn't want him to Digivolve again. Meanwhile a Digimon that Yamaki destroyed with the Yuggoth, Musyamon, reconfigures it self and comes to the real world.
11.TitleJapanese: 新宿大ガード １分３０秒の対決！

12.SummaryEnglish: Rika and Renamon are still not back together. A Harpymon Bio-Emerges in the real world.
12.TitleJapanese: ルキとレナモン きずなの危機！

13.SummaryEnglish: Rika and Takato begin to understand more about digimon. Yamaki creates a program that will eliminate all Digimon from the Real World and tells Takato about the danger that Digimon really are.
13.TitleJapanese: デジモン捕獲指令！災いの頼ｴ

14.SummaryEnglish: Yamaki's Juggernaut program malfunctions, and a seemingly unstoppable Ultimate Level Digimon called Mihiramon biomerges. Takato and Guilmon try to stop Mihiramon before he harms the city.
14.TitleJapanese: テイマーよ立て！メガログラウモン超進化

15.SummaryEnglish: A Deva called Sandiramon is wreaking havoc in the subway. Will Sandiramon pose as a deadly threat to the Tamers, or can they defeat this new Deva?
15.TitleJapanese: 巨大ヘビ出現！大江戸線大パニック

16.TitleEnglish: Back to Nature, Back to Battle
16.SummaryEnglish: Henry and Takato go on a camping trip with their classes and they decide to bring along Guilmon, Terriermon, and Calumon. A new Deva called Sindurumon appears on the camp.
16.TitleJapanese: 街の灯を守れ！デジモンたちの危険なキャンプ

17.SummaryEnglish: After Henry receives a Digimon card that somehow turns into a Blue Card, he gets Takato and Rika to investigate with him about this mysterious card. Two of the Devas attack.
17.TitleJapanese: ブルーカードを追え！ ラピッドモン電光石火

18.SummaryEnglish: Vajramon offers Renamon to join the Devas. When she declines, can the Tamers destroy Vajramon for the second time?
18.TitleJapanese: 美しき進化！ 月光に舞うタオモン

19.SummaryEnglish: Impmon says he hates humans to cover up his own insecurities. The Tamers are battling the next Deva Indramon. Impmon decides to battle this Deva all by himself to become strong.
19.TitleJapanese: 強くなりたい！ 這い上がれインプモン

20.SummaryEnglish: Yamaki hires Henry's dad Janyu to work for him to help get rid of Digimon. Yamaki gathers the rest of the "Wild Bunch", the people that helped Janyu create the Digimon. Meanwhile, Indramon comes back and the Tamers are in trouble again.
20.TitleJapanese: 切り札はこれだ！友情のブルーカード

21.SummaryEnglish: Kumbhiramon, a Deva appears and attacks Jeri. A Leomon appears to save her, but to his dismay, Jeri believes that she is his Tamer.
21.TitleJapanese: 樹莉のパートナー !? 私のレオモン様

22.SummaryEnglish: Vikaralamon, the Pig Deva, Bio-Emerges and begins to rampage on Shinjuku. Can Takato, Henry, and Rika find a way to gain Blue Cards to Digivolve their Digimon to Ultimate Level?
22.TitleJapanese: ヴィカラーラモン登場 僕たちの街を守れ！

23.SummaryEnglish: Now that each of the Tamers' Digimon are at Ultimate Level, they can fight Vikaralamon. Yamaki activates the Juggernaut to destroy all the digimon.
23.TitleJapanese: デジモン総出撃！風に向かって進め

24.SummaryEnglish: After Calumon is stolen, the Tamers decide to go to the Digital World to save him, this begins their new journey.
24.TitleJapanese: デジタルワールドへ・・・・旅立ちの日

25.SummaryEnglish: The Tamers and their Digimon make it to the Digital World. As they venture on in their first day trying to find Calumon, they are attacked by a Meramon and later caught in a Jagamon stampede.
25.TitleJapanese: デジタルワールド突入！さらば僕たちの街

26.SummaryEnglish: After getting separated from the rest of the group, Kazu, Kenta, Rika and Renamon appear in a windy valley. Jijimon and Babamon appear to help them. Kazu and Kenta believe that they are Jijimon and Babamon's Tamers.
26.TitleJapanese: 小世界 ! 風の強い谷のジジモン・ババモン

27.SummaryEnglish: After being separated from the rest, Takato, Guilmon, Henry, Terriermon, Jeri, and Leomon appear at a village of Chuchidarumon that is attacked by a berserk motorcycle. Meanwhile, Impmon encounters the Dog Deva Chatsuramon whose boss offers Impmon the power to Digivolve.
27.TitleJapanese: インプモン進化! 魔王ベルゼブモンの戦慄

28.SummaryEnglish: In a clock-like cloud plane, Rika encounters an old opponent from the Digimon Card Tournament, the legendary Ryo Akiyama.

29.SummaryEnglish: Ryo, Kazu and Kenta finally catch up with Takato and the rest of the Tamers. Makuramon and Majiramon attack.
29.TitleJapanese: ここは幽霊の城 ! 迷えるクルモン大脱出

30.SummaryEnglish: Remnants of the Hypnos organization try to start up the Juggernaut system again which causes a storm in the Digital World. Beelzemon and Chatsuramon try to recapture Calumon from the Tamers.
30.TitleJapanese: デジタルワールドからの緊急連絡 クルモンが …

31.SummaryEnglish: After a Digital Storm that separated the Tamers, Rika and those with her end up in a swamp-like area where Orochimon has enslaved the local village of Gekomon and an Andromon is the only resistant one. What happens when Orochimon steals Jeri?
31.TitleJapanese: ガードロモンとの友情 ! 僕も戦うテイマーヒロカズ

32.SummaryEnglish: Lost underwater, Takato, Henry and Terriermon look for a way out. Shibumi one of the "Wild Bunch" appears, and they learn more than what they wanted to.
32.TitleJapanese: ギルモン誕生の謎！ 神秘なる水の宇宙

33.SummaryEnglish: Suzie ends up in the Digital World and befriends the Rabbit Deva Antylamon as Makuramon targets Suzie.
33.TitleJapanese: テリアモンはどこ ! 小春デジタルワールドへ

34.SummaryEnglish: Lopmon leads Takato, Henry, Terriermon, and Suzie to the gates of Zhuqiaomon's castle. Beelzemon appears infront of them and attacks them.
34.TitleJapanese: 心優しき勇者レオモン死す!

35.SummaryEnglish: Because of Takato's anger, Guilmon Digivolves to Megidramon, an evil Virus type Mega. Soon, the whole Digital World is going mad. Megidramon begins to attack everyone.
35.TitleJapanese: その名はデュークモン!真なる究極進化

36.SummaryEnglish: Now that Takato and Guilmon are now Gallantmon, a vaccine type mega Digimon, they can battle Beelzemon. An intense battle begins.
36.TitleJapanese: 決戦!デュークモン対ベルゼブモン

37.SummaryEnglish: The Tamers begin their battle against the Deva's superior Zhuqiaomon. Zhuqiaomon being a Mega easily outpowers the Tamers.
37.TitleJapanese: 対決スーツェーモン ! セントガルゴモン究極進化

38.SummaryEnglish: The battle against Zhuqiaomon continues. During the fight, Guilmon and Takato Bio-Merge again into Gallantmon and fight Zhuqiamon until another Sovereign called Azulongmon stops both of them.
38.TitleJapanese: 動き出した真の敵 ! 四聖獣の戦い

39.SummaryEnglish: Azulongmon and Zhuquiomon lead the Tamers to the location of the D-Reaper, inside a deep pit, nearby they find Ryo. Rika attempts to go down the pit by herself, but the D-Reaper appears.
39.TitleJapanese: 舞い散る究極の花！サクヤモン進化

40.SummaryEnglish: Henry's dad and the rest of his helpers send an "Arc" for the Tamers to go back to the real world. Beelzemon, being sad for all the pain he caused, changes back to Impmon. Renamon and Rika found him and asked him to join them on their way home.
40.TitleJapanese: 進化の輝き シャイニング・エボリューション

41.SummaryEnglish: As the Ark is beginning to take off, Rika and Ryo rush to get to the Ark before it takes off toward the Real World. Jeri begins to act weird upon returning.
41.TitleJapanese: 帰還 リアル・ワールドへ！

42.SummaryEnglish: The Tamers make it back to the Real World. Soon after they find out that the D-Reaper is there too.
42.TitleJapanese: デ・リーパに襲われた街

43.SummaryEnglish: The D-Reaper is attacking in the Digital World. The Tamers are planning what to do about the D-Reaper. Impmon looks for Ai and Mako, his Tamers.
43.TitleJapanese: つながる心。復活のベルゼブモン

44.SummaryEnglish: The D-Reaper continues his attack against the Real World, and the Tamers can't biomerge. A girl named Alice appears and says she can solve their problem.
44.TitleJapanese: 謎の少女 The Girl In Black

45.SummaryEnglish: Now that they can Bio-Merge with their Digimon, the Tamers fight with the latest of the D-Reaper's agents. During the battle Takato and Guilmon get inside the D-Reaper, where they find Jeri.
45.TitleJapanese: デ・リーパーに立ち向かえ ゾーン突入 !

46.SummaryEnglish: A new digimon, Justimon appears, and he is the result of the Bio-Merge between Cyberdramon and Ryo. Together with Sakuyamon and MegaGargomon they must save Takato and Guilmon.
46.TitleJapanese: 爽やかな究極戦士 ジャスティモン見参！

47.SummaryEnglish: Jeri's dad becomes determined to get his daughter back. The Tamers must protect him from two of the D-Reaper's agents.
47.TitleJapanese: デュークモンを救え！グラニ緊急発進

48.SummaryEnglish: Beelzemon begins to redeem himself to Jeri by trying to break her free of the D-Reaper.
48.TitleJapanese: 樹莉を守る力、ベルゼブモンの拳

49.SummaryEnglish: Beezlemon fails to save Jeri, and the D-Reaper starts changes form. The Tamers fall back and form a new attack plan.
49.TitleJapanese: 首都壊滅！クルモンの願い

50.SummaryEnglish: Jeri is struggling to escape the D-Reaper core. The Tamers prepare to go against the D-Reaper for the last battle.
50.TitleJapanese: 紅蓮の騎士よ愛するものたちを救え！

51.SummaryEnglish: Gallantmon is now Gallantmon Crimson Mode. MegaGargomon activates the program Henry's dad implanted him to stop the D-Reaper.
51.TitleJapanese: 夢見る力こそ 僕らの未来
